title: Breaking Down ‘Mindhunter’ and the ‘Black Panther’ Trailer (Ep. 195)
description:
After getting called out by director Sam Esmail, The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald return to their television roots by discussing David Fincher’s new Netflix series, ‘Mindhunter’ (6:00). Later they discuss actual televisions, the new trailer for 'Black Panther,' and the film's potential (26:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
